Steps to reproduce:

Visit http://mbd.scout.com/mb.aspx?s=304&f=2062.  Press Ctrl++ to zoom in.  No problem.  Now reload the page.


Actual results:

The page content is cut off on the right and bottom, and scrollbars are not visible.


Expected results:

Content wraps properly at the right edge of the page, and vertical scrollbar appears.

Works fine with javascript disabled.
May be they do some faultily screen width detection.

Other way to reproduce:
- Press Ctrl+ to zoom out  (no problem)
- Now reload the page

Result: A new, smaller viewport inside the old one was created.
Please report this to scout.com
